channel.title: git on goshSAMit
channel.description: Recent content in git on goshSAMit

item.title: Git Commands
item.description: Steps to connect to a Github repository Create the repository (repo) on Github Create a folder on your local device that you want to hold the repo Run the following command to clone the Github repository git clone repo_url_from_github Run the following command to link “origin” to github url git remote set-url origin repo_url_from_github Run the following commands to link your commits to your name and email address git config --global user.
